title: Bladed Armour - looking better?
body:
Is now more necessary to take this mastery? I used to only take it on a few junglers, but I think it might actually be worth taking a point in it with this new jungle.

"When enemy monsters attack you, they are inflicted with bleed for 2 seconds, dealing 1% of their current health as physical damage each second."

replies.body:
Depends on who you're playing. If you want to save the most amount of health during a clear then yeah, go for it. If you're a farming jungler like Udyr or Yi, then go 21/0/9, investing the points into the utility tree.

I'd take it on champs like Shaco or Xin, who rather gank than farm.
Yeah I agree. It would stack well with an early Gromp Poison Thornmail buff as well.
